abstract: The Hartford Financial Services Group announced that a former top executive of Bank of America, Liam E. McGee, would take over as chairman and chief executive on Thursday.
snippet: The Hartford Financial Services Group announced that a former top executive of Bank of America, Liam E. McGee, would take over as chairman and chief executive on Thursday.
lead_paragraph: The Hartford Financial Services Group announced late Tuesday that a former top executive of Bank of America, Liam E. McGee, would take over as chairman and chief executive on Thursday. Mr. McGee will succeed Ramani Ayer, who announced in June that he would retire.

headline.main: Hartford Taps Ex-BofA Executive to Be Its New Chief
